page.title: 01GAZETTEER OF THE AREA
page.content: { OUR AREA IS IN THE NORTH WEST OF {LEEDS AND SPREADS OVER THE VALLY OF {THE RIVER AIRE.THE VALLEY ITSELF {CONTAINS THREE MAJOUR MODES OF {TRANSPORT,A MAJOUR ROAD,RAILWAY AND {THE LEEDS LIVERPOOL CANAL.MUCH OF THE {HEAVY INDUSTRY IS NOW DYING OUT,BEING {REPLACED BY 8 INDUSTRIES SUCH AS {ELECTRONICES.THE HISTORIC MONUMENT OF {KIRKSTALL ABBEY IS ALSO SITUATED IN {THE VALLEY BOTTOM { SPREADING UP BOTH SIDES OF THE {VALLEY ARE MANY DIFFERENT TYPES OF {RESIDENTIAL AREAS,BACK TO BACK {TERRACES,LARGE COUNCIL ESTATES AND {BIG DETACHED HOUSES.GIVING LIFE TO {MANY DIFERENT TYPES OF HOME LIFE AND A {VARYING POPULATION DENSITY { CONSIDERING THE BUILT UP AREAS IN {LEEDS WE ARE LUCKY TO HAVE PARKS ETC..
